page.title: 20AN INTERVIEW WITH A LOCAL
page.content: HAVE YOU ALWAYS LIVED HERE? Yes I was born in the house that I am presently living in. WOULD YOU LIKE TO MOVE? No,because my wife and family are here. HAVE YOU SEEN ANY CHANGES IN THE AREA IN THE LAST 40 YEARS? Yes there are more cars on the road and the methods of farming are more sophiscated.there are also more machines used on the farm to ease the burden of work for the farmer. WHAT CHANGES WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE TAKE PLACE IN THE AREA? I think that the road network could be improved but I would not like to see this area change.
